notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of status resistance.
Only reacts on modifiers placed by enemy player units. Modifiers placed by neutral creeps or by allies do not trigger it.
Reacts on any modifier, not only debuffs, including modifiers that are fully unaffected by status resistance.
Endurance takes place before the triggering debuff is placed, meaning the triggering debuff is affected by the status resistance.
abilities.description: Whenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant 40% Status resistance for 3 seconds.

name: Ascetic's Cap
description: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.
